attributes.action: Employees can't be laid off if they don't meet the targets.
attributes.additional_details: Well I am unable to meet the targets at  the company I work as it can be too difficult.  So I would like this petition to help those workers
attributes.background: Help workers to not get fired if they don't meet the employers targets.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to make people redundant are a matter for employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
